# üíº Commercial Licensing & Support

## Overview

Synapse Protocol is available under **dual licensing**:

### üÜì AGPLv3 (Open Source)
- **Free forever** for open source projects
- Must open-source your entire application
- Ideal for: Research, education, personal projects, FOSS

### üí∞ Commercial License
- For closed-source/proprietary applications
- No requirement to open-source your code
- Includes: Priority support, custom features, SLA

---

## Who Needs a Commercial License?

‚úÖ **YES - You need a commercial license if:**
- Building a SaaS product (closed backend)
- Embedding in proprietary software
- Cannot/won't open-source your application
- Need enterprise support (SLA, custom features)

‚ùå **NO - AGPLv3 is fine if:**
- Your entire application is open source
- Building internal tools (no distribution)
- Research/academic use
- Contributing back to the project

---

## Premium Features (Enterprise Only)

These features are **NOT** in the open source version:

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Medical LoRA Adapters** | Pre-trained for healthcare (HIPAA-aware) |
| **Multi-Tenant Infrastructure** | SaaS-ready with namespace isolation |
| **Compliance Modules** | HIPAA, SOC2, GDPR compliance layers |
| **Advanced Sync** | High-availability P2P mesh networks |
| **Model Marketplace** | Pre-trained domain-specific adapters |

3. Revenue stage (pre-revenue, seed, Series A+)

---

## FAQ

### Q: Can I use Synapse Protocol in my startup for free?
**A:** YES, if your entire application (including backend) is open source under AGPLv3. Otherwise, you need a commercial license.

### Q: What if I only use it internally (not distributing)?
**A:** AGPLv3 applies even to network use. If employees/users access it remotely, it's "distribution" under AGPLv3. Commercial license recommended.

### Q: Can I try before buying?
**A:** YES. Use the open source version to prototype. When you're ready to go closed-source, contact us.

### Q: Do I get the source code with a commercial license?
**A:** YES. Commercial license includes full source access + right to modify.

### Q: Can I resell Synapse Protocol?
**A:** Enterprise tier includes white-label/reseller rights. Contact us for details.
